setCustomProperty(com.google.android.gms.Description: Sets a Custom File Property for the resource. Note that the total size of the key string and the value string of a custom property should not exceed @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#MetadataChangeSet#CUSTOM_PROPERTY_SIZE_LIMIT_BYTES_E@ bytes in UTF-8 encoding. As the default charset on Android is UTF-8, the byte length of a string in UTF-8 encoding can be calculated simply by using stringObject.getBytes().length (See http://developer.android.com/reference/java/lang/String.html#getBytes()) Also, note that there are limits on the number of custom properties a resource can have. See @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#MetadataChangeSet#MAX_PUBLIC_PROPERTIES_PER_RESOURCE_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#MetadataChangeSet#MAX_PRIVATE_PROPERTIES_PER_RESOURCE_PER_APP_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#MetadataChangeSet#MAX_TOTAL_PROPERTIES_PER_RESOURCE_E@ for details. If these limits are exceeded, the operation to apply this metadata change will fail.
setCustomProperty(com.google.android.gms.FullName: public MetadataChangeSet.Builder setCustomProperty (CustomPropertyKey key, String value)

setDescription(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the description for the resource.

setTitle(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the title for the resource.

setStarred(boolean).Description: Sets whether the resource will be starred.

setViewed(boolean).Description: Sets whether the resource has been viewed.

setPinned(boolean).Description: If true, the file's contents will be kept up to date locally and thus the contents will be available when the device is offline. Pinning a file uses bandwidth and storage space, so it should only be done in response to an explicit user request. Note that only files where @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#Metadata#isPinnable_E@ is true can be pinned.

setLastViewedByMeDate(java.util.Date).Description: Sets the date when the user most recently viewed the resource.

setIndexableText(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the text to be indexed for the resource.

setMimeType(java.lang.String).Description: Sets a MIME type for the resource.

deleteCustomProperty(com.google.android..Description: Deletes the given custom property of the resource.

ClassDesc: A builder for creating a new MetadataChangeSet.
